name: UPS conversion mod
description: This device replaces conventional battery connections with a connector port that can plug into a UPS.  Any device modified with this can be used without a battery as long as you have a charged UPS with you.

name: reactor core expansion device
description: This is an expansion device for use on plutonium-powered equipment.  With enough electronics skill, you could attach this to an atomic tool to double the amount of plutonium it can hold.  Note that this device is incompatible with the atomic battery mod.

name: battery compartment mod
description: A battery compartment mod that allows using vehicle batteries and small storage batteries in regular tools.

name: light battery mod
description: A battery compartment mod that allows the use of light batteries in tools that otherwise could not.

name: medium battery mod
description: A battery compartment mod that allows the use of medium batteries in tools that otherwise could not.

name: heavy battery mod
description: A battery compartment mod that allows the use of heavy batteries in tools that otherwise could not.
